tool_description:
The Footballdata API gives acces to football data, livescores and football news from various countries, leaques, teams and clubs around the world. 

+20 countries, 292 leagues, 3828 clubs, 95306 players

Documentation: https://footballdataapi.com/
name: Footballdata
title: Footballdata

api_list.name: v1 - country by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://footballdata4.p.rapidapi.com/countries/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "footballdata4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://footballdata4.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "footballdata4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
